hibernate-mapping.query: FROM com.ff.domain.ratemanagement.masters.RateTaxComponentDO rateTaxComponentDO WHERE rateTaxComponentDO.taxGroup =:taxGroup AND (:currentDate BETWEEN rateTaxComponentDO.effectiveFrom AND rateTaxComponentDO.effectiveTo) AND ((rateTaxComponentDO.state.stateId IS NULL) OR (rateTaxComponentDO.state.stateId =:state)) AND rateTaxComponentDO.activeStatus = 'A' ORDER BY rateTaxComponentDO.state DESC
